title: 133 - North Pole Variant
description:
The Gang talks best and worst of karaoke and goes Irish in an attempt to woo more American audiences. Tim forgets some material and Luke sees the weirdest form of the elephant man. Heather tries to lay down some bars and Livy puts on an all-out beatbox concert you won’t want to miss. Plus, a call in from the North Pole from good ol’ Dr. Fauci! Turns out, it’s pretty dang tough to swab an elf. 
 Big thanks to our sponsors of this episode!
 Mack Weldon: For 20% off your first order, go to  mackweldon.com/HAWKINS and enter promo code HAWKINS
 Faithful Counseling: Go to  faithfulcounseling.com/TIMHAWKINS for 10% off of your first month of counseling.
  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
